main.bio: After being in the creative industry for 8 years I decided it was time to challenge the other side of my brain. I went back to school for an associate degree in web and software development and secured a dual role position at Kohl's 1 year through my degree. Since then I've developed and deployed 6 internal facing applications.

education.description: This 6-month bootcamp offered a comprehensive foundation in practical Cybersecurity concepts and principles with a strong emphasis on the tools and technologies currently employed by industry professionals.

This program provided a wide range of material including multiple programming languages (both front and back-end), web development frameworks, software engineering principles, and database management.
I was provided a hands-on experience with industry-standard equipment and software where I explored various photography genres, and developed critical thinking and visual communication abilities.
